author: AzM MzA
comment: I was gonna issue a refund but....There aren't that many dialers and I've tried a few. This is probably gonna be the one. I understand not many use the pound key but I do please add that. And also give us the ability to select themes or colors. Then 5 stars
title: Not too shabby

author: John Newman
comment: Beautifully presented app that is a joy to use. Certainly the best I've tried. Just needs phone to be forced to speaker mode when answering from the watch, then it would be perfect.
title: Nearly perfect

author: Shadi Shalabi
comment: To enable the call to use watch for some android wear watched that have a speaker. Will give 5 stars when it does.
title: Nice but missing option

author: Al Thomka
comment: This should be included as a basic part of Android Wear! Pictures for speed dial is a nice addition!
title: Great app!

author: Giovonni Fareed
comment: When accepting calls is there a way to automatically have the phone turn on  speakerphone, as of now that does not work even when option checked to allow speakerphone

author: Gordon Toye
comment: Incoming call notification quit working motto 360 HTC m8

author: Michael Parnell
comment: This app works perfectly, this should be included with Android wear . 5 stars.
title: Moto360 2nd

author: dan Bdan
comment: ie for conference call..seems to remove the delay character
title: doesn't like pin numbers...

author: SHAILESH SINHA
comment: Very good and user friendly app
title: Shailesh Sinha

author: VENKAT NAVEEN
comment: Best dialer for wear

author: rajkumar sangepu
comment: App enables the speaker phone over phone  when dialed  from android wear watch but doesn't let md talk from watch directly. I dont know if this is possible from any watch other than Android Wear watch. It would be good if  i had that option otherwise I think I should  have Bluetooth headset to speak.
title: Good but doesn't let me talk over watch

author: Darren Hubbard
comment: It generally works OK but it occasionally leaves a little mini icon on the watches home screen that doesn't seem to do anything but does cause the dialer to launch everytime I activate the watches display... Five stars if I could get rid of that!
title: Generally OK but annoying mini icon

author: David P
comment: I originally rated this app 1 star because it was a great idea but it didn't work on my phone. Within 24 hours the developer contacted me and is working with me to get this working with my custom ROM.  This is by far the best developer I've ever worked with and I'm looking forward to using the app.
title: Great idea and developer!!#

author: Michael Lang
comment: I bought it for the speaker phone function but that doesn't seem to work on Note 4. Maybe dev can test it. I checked the checkbox. Plus contact images don't show.
title: Works but with flaws on Note 4

comment: Does not handle wait, pause and other standard characters in numbers. Wait (;) should prompt user and then enter the rest of the string until the next wait, etc.  Also needs the ability to mute and unmute during calls.

author: Mr2pint
comment: Two days with this app and it's quite good for what's available right now on play store. couple of things, incoming calls with automatic speaker enabled would be handy, since when i answer i'm often in car and fiddling around for speaker isn't that safe. Also pictures in contacts would be another nice feature. all and all a good app, Android wear should have added this from the start.
title: I'm happy but certainly not perfect.

author: Michael Lightbourne
comment: When I first installed the app a couple of months ago, the Mini Dialer launched okay on my Moto 360, but it screwed up my ability to make calls on my S4 (even manually).  Consequently, I uninstalled the app.  Yesterday I tried Mini Dialer again.  And wow... what an improvement!  The dialer works great with my S4 and the new features (Contacts, Call Log and Speed Dialer) are really nice.  The only feature that needs to be improved is the Speed Dialer.  The design gives you blank faces of the names/numbers on your speed dial, hence you have no idea of where a number is placed on the speed dialer.  If you cannot put face pics, then I would at least add a number (1-12) to assist with trying to figure out where a speed number is placed.
title: Really Improved!

author: Dennis Xie
comment: I've been toying with a few dialer apps and this one has worked for me, halfway. Outgoing calls work as intended and the speakerphone is enabled on my phone's dialer. However, this doesn't allow me to answer calls with the speakerphone enabled on my phone. This means I'll still have to do it via my phone's interface. Not ideal. I realised this app is purely targeted towards outgoing calls, but handling incoming calls is important to me as well.
title: Halfway There

author: Nrseife S
comment: Well done; thanks for adding a manual sync of all contacts. Would be great if developper adds offline search capabillities by adding letters of the alphabet to reduce and limit contacts to scroll through (if not yet in speed dial) and offer sorting according to first or last name.
title: Great app

author: Parvez Ahmed Jalil
comment: Amazingly useful app.. Only thing I would advise the developer is to implement a touch tone keypad during in-call e.g... Press option 1 etc... People like myself who use a Bluetooth headset for calls signed not being able to sort out  This is a glaring omission to an outstanding app! Also maybe consider adding a "hold" button
title: Fantastic!.'..... But!

author: Brian Kami
comment: Thus is a good app. I won't why Google didn't pre install this. One small thing is that it doesn't show the contacts image on the watch. That would make it close to perfect for me.
title: Good app.

author: Hossam eldin Fathy
comment: Great app but there are some things needed to get 5 stars like having indecator in phone log identifying the call direction also it got crashed while trying to make a call and mobile network was disconnected, one more thing i can't see the bluetooth support as i can't activate the bluetooth to forward the call to bluetooth headset from the app ui directly.
title: Great app but!

author: Alen Simon
comment: Worth every penny!  Works flawlessly with my Huawei watch and now I've found enough reason to wear it all the time. All I need to do is to place my phone in my back pocket with its speaker/microphone side up. Also installed the coolest watch face it's called Bagital Watch Face...

author: Charles Turner
comment: App does all per description, so 4 out of 5 stars as the only downside is that it transfers all contacts to the watch.  I would prefer to have the option of only syncing with specific group(s) to the phone.  Other than that small limitation, very nice app.  Installed on LG G Watch R and LG G2.
title: Very good app but transfers all contacts on phone.

author: Johnny Carmona
comment: I like this app because, with a Bluetooth ear piece, I wouldn't need to take my phone out. Though, since I use Google Voice as a business number on my phone, and I have it set to ask me each time whether to use GV, I still have to pull out my phone. So, if you guys could somehow integrate this with GV, I would greatly appreciate it. Thanks.
title: Works great so far.

author: Dan Negulescu
comment: Works perfect with my LG G Watch R and Sony Xperia Z3 Compact. It syncs great, and I can't really understand why it is not incorporated directly into the Android Wear. Congratulations to the developer! 100% I recommend this app.
title: Great app!

author: Glenn Robinson
comment: Fantastically useful, but would be great if mute button was available (tend to use hands free for conference calls whilst driving to work, mute is essential!). Please make this a 5 star app by adding!
title: Great app, needs mute feature though

author: Lenny D
comment: Just downloaded/installed this on my Note 3. But the app does not appear on My LG G Watch R. Hoping the developer will be able to advice me about how to get it to work.
title: Was Excited about this but....

comment: Now this should be the standard for smartwatches! Easy setup and works flawless. Speed dial, access to phone book or just punch in the number, all works great. Truly a must have!
title: Great app!

author: Anon amous
comment: When im on a call, I expect it to be at the top of the notification list, not have to search for it...
title: Why do I need to scroll down?

author: Shahriar Khan
comment: I have need to refund my money back.  It's not appropriate Apps.  Incoming call can't handle. I don't understand how it's get above 4 rating.
title: In coming call can't response

author: Christopher Parker
comment: Bought this and it works on my gear 2 running Android wear it's a clean smooth app that works well and I'm sure the developer will improve upon it.  This is the first Android wear app I've purchased also :-)
title: It works great what can I say

author: Alexandra Allen
comment: When I try to dial a number always says that is disconnected or sound like a fax machine.
title: Dialer doesn't work for me.

author: Carl Graser
comment: Works great on my LG G Watch. I don't know why the phone does not come with this app already installed.

author: McGary Chan
comment: This is a great Android watch app if it can support dual sim card device.(xperia z3 dual). I should give a 5 stars when your team fix this .
title: Cannot Support Dual Sim card device

author: prashant kumar
comment: Works flawless. I am surprised why its not provided as basic feature.
title: Very useful

author: Cubamus Prime
comment: Not good
title: Why hasn't this app been updated?

author: Roy Portillo
comment: The commands for it are spot on. No delay when pressing anything. Easy to use
title: Really great app

author: DJ Fusco
comment: Can I change background to black so it's easier to read black and white.
title: Nice dialer

author: Shane Muscat
comment: It works great when you want to call someone hands free.
title: A must buy.
